kwargs.content:
IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM THE SYSTEM:

You have access to the following resources: 
[{"_id":"686ce0dfa86bfe7e4361c7be","name":"Meta Ads Campaign Structure and Scaling Playbook Q2 2025","description":"Reference this resource to design, launch, and scale Meta ad campaigns using Q2 2025 best practices, covering attribution, campaign structure, creative testing, AI integration, and budget management.","content_length":1563},{"_id":"686ce0e9a86bfe7e4361c7bf","name":"Meta Ads Strategy: Campaign Structure and Best Practices","description":"Use this resource to plan, execute, and optimize Meta advertising campaigns according to Meta’s latest AI-driven best practices, including campaign structuring, creative testing, and performance measurement.","content_length":1801}]

And you have access to saved ads for inspiration, organized via the following tags: ["Copy Scientifico","hook","earthlyderm","copy skin glow-up","US","Curcuma","Product Page","Beauty"]

Now, you are connected again with the real end user

Ok I got it, I'll respond to the user naturally in the following of this chat.
I'll use resources and tools whenever it's required by the context.
ciao dimmi i tag delle mie ads salvate, e prendi 2 ads tramite il tag che preferisci

I tag delle tue ads salvate sono: Curcuma, Beauty, copy skin glow-up, hook, earthlyderm, Copy Scientifico, Product Page, US.

Ho preso due ads con il tag "hook" che mi sembra interessante per il coinvolgimento:

1. Ad ID: 1132754415366171
   - Testo: Unlock your skin's potential with our Turmeric Skincare Line! Glow-enhancing face wash, spot-fading scrub, skin-regenerating glow butter.
   - Link: https://www.myaplbun.com/products/glow-combo
   - Video e immagine disponibili.

2. Ad ID: 1254423029699783
   - Testo: Testimonianza di una donna di 41 anni che ha avuto risultati con Glow Shot, un prodotto minimalista che esfolia e illumina la pelle senza irritazioni.
   - Link: Non specificato
   - Video e immagine disponibili.

Se vuoi posso analizzare uno dei due più nel dettaglio o trarre spunti per la tua campagna, dimmi pure! Vuoi approfondire?
